title: Count Paths in Maze

explanation.approach: Sum of paths from left and above.

title: Palindrome Partition Count

steps: If rest is palindrome, no more cuts
Else try each palindrome prefix, cut, recurse

title: Kth Symbol in Grammar
description: Find kth symbol in row n.

explanation.approach: Find parent symbol, flip if needed.
steps: If k odd, same as parent; else flip
